name: Cuub DEMO
description:
Cuub is a single-person project platformer game where you play as "Cuub" (the main character) and you have to save your best friend (nicknamed "Leader") from the Dark Lord, an evil entity from the underworld that wants to harness a secret power.

Created entirely by ShxDowXD, in this game you will jump, slide, create and parkour you way to victory, (Defeating The Dark Lord), along the way you will meet many unforgettable friends and foes, some you may help, and some may not help you...

Cuub is currently in development by ShxDowXD and does not have a release date yet.

DEVELOPERS NOTE: Upon downloading/installing the game it is likely that your computer may detect it as a dangerous file, It is not a dangerous file it just hasn't been downloaded many times so it gets flagged for being suspicious. It may also ask you for the administrator password for no reason, and I don't know why it happens but it doesn't mean anything.

If you game runs slowly or stutters you can just contact us via Twitter or this website I can always give you a copy of the game that will fit your computer setup better if needed :).
